scripts.install: npm --prefix back-end install && npm --prefix front-end install
scripts.start: npx concurrently 'npm --prefix back-end start' 'npm --prefix front-end start'
scripts.start:dev: npx concurrently 'npm --prefix back-end run start:dev' 'npm --prefix front-end start'
scripts.test: npm run test:back-end test && npm run test:front-end
